extendedInfo.description: Most everyone has heard of the Chicken Soup for the Soul series that was created by Jack Canfield and Mark Victor Hansen. The purpose of those books was to help heal the souls of the masses. With over 100 million readers worldwide it seemed only natural for the founders to try to help just as many people heal their bodies. The idea of sound body and mind sparked the creation of the Chicken Soup for the Soul supplements.Chicken Soup for the Soul Supplements was created by a joint venture with New Health Systems LLC. The reason for Jack Canfield and Mark Hansen working with this health company is because they share the same level of commitment in helping people enrich their lives.The purpose of these supplements is to offer people a more natural and also nutritional way to improve their quality of life. The first two products that were released were SierraFlex and TrimWorks. TrimWorks is a carbohydrate blocker used to help people loose weight and SierraFlex is for improved joint mobility and protection. Naturally Jack and Mark claim that these products have given them and their family and friends "amazing results." There haven't been any negative reports to counter that claim.Chicken Soup for the Soul supplements have grown to include vitamins formulated especially for men and some for women. There are also supplements to help you better cope with stress and tension as well as nutritional shakes. What Jack and Mark are trying to do is meet every need that their customers have. The stand behind their products and their claims plus they have the backing of sound clinical data and intense research.In their never ending quest to help the whole person, the have also created a business opportunity for people. There is a page on their site where you can request to be contacted by someone with in the company to explain the business opportunity to you and the benefits that they have to offer. It is important to stress that they do not require you to buy and use the products yourself in order to be a consultant.If you are looking for a way to bring in extra income, or add another product to your current business checking out Chicken Soup for the Soul supplements is worthwhile. You'll be working with a product that is already known world wide.
